Prep
  • Check the weather and wear layers
    • Bring:
    • Food, snacks and booze
    • Towel and dry clothes
    • Sunglasses, hat and sunscreen
    • Games and floaties
Dusable Harbor
  • Parking Lockbox Number: 6
  • Parking Lockbox Code: 7232
  • Bathroom Code: 324#
  • Dock: B
  • Dock Gate Code: 51048#
  • Dock Slip: 35
  • Boat Door Code: 2145
Speaker Bluetooth
  1. Press CALL, rotate the control dial to select [PAIRING], then press it.
  2. Select [Sony Automotive] on your phone.
